蜭字的基本解释

蜭
hàn
古书上说的一种毛虫，有毒，蜇人。

蜭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hàn］
［《廣韻》胡感切，上感，匣。］
亦作“蛿1”。
一种有毒螫人的毛虫。

蜭字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蜭； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1087第08
【唐韻】胡感切【集韻】戸感切，?音頷。蟲名。【爾雅·釋蟲】蜭，毛蠹。【註】卽蛓。　又【廣韻】胡紺切，音憾。義同。　或作蛿。

蜭字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蜭字的起名意思

暂无。

Wei
Basic explanation of words
Wei
hàn
A caterpillar described in ancient books is poisonous and stinging.
Wei
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hàn］
["Guangyun" has a sense of cut, upper sense, box. ]
Also known as "蛿1".
A venomous sting caterpillar.
Wei
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蜭; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1087-08
[Tang Yun] Hu Ganqi [Jiyun] 戸 Feeling cut,? The sound is nodded. Insect name. 【Erya·Release Insects】Hydrite, hair beetle. [Note] 卽蛓.　[Guangyun] Hu Gangqie, sound regretful. The same meaning.　Or as 蛿.
